name: Sweet and Gooey Chicken Wings
author: Jilly Cooper
summary: Sweet and gooey chicken wings prepared with common ingredients, very tender.
ingredients: ½ teaspoon minced fresh ginger root
directions: In a 9x13 inch casserole, combine soy sauce, brown sugar, oil, ginger, and garlic powder
Mix until brown sugar completely dissolves into the mixture
Place the chicken wings in the dish and turn them over until they are all well coated
Cover the dish and refrigerate for at least 4 hours
Turn the chicken again, after 2 hours
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Bake chicken at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C), covered, for 45 minutes
Turn the chicken wings, and spoon sauce from the bottom of the pan over the tops of the wings
